channel.description: Recent content on Enter The Exit

item.title: Growth
item.description: Seed When we see a model in life, we generally tend to try, more or less consciously, to become more like it. Because we see something in this person that inspires us, or that feels so right, that we just want to take even just a piece of that for ourselves. Be it a value, a point of view, a character trait, many things can trigger this phenomenon. Is it his unbreakable determination?

item.title: Winter feeling
item.description: Introduction: It’s cold outside. Your nose is hardened by the cold and it starts running. Your fingertips are numb and your gloves don’t keep the warmth enough. Your breath creates wonderful volutes that your eyes, squinting through the wind, sometimes contemplate. And you find in your pockets, the cold metal that would deliver you. Your fingers have trouble holding it straight and turning it, but it clicks, it opens, and here you are.

item.title: Head in the clouds
Bayes
item.description: Explication viteuf de ce que j’entendais par “bayésien”: Disons que le personnage P effectue le calcul de la formule de Bayes1 qui lui donne donc pour résultat 80% pour A et 20% pour B. Il choisira donc A car la probabilité est plus élevé et effectuera éventuellement des actions en accord avec le fait que A est probablement plus vrai -selon ses informations- que B. Cependant le personnage L apporte de nouvelles données.

item.title: Supernovae
item.description: Encore un débat, je sens déjà que ça pétille en moi. Ça gronde à chaque virgule, ça détonne à chaque point. Je navigue dans cette logique, ces prémisses délicates, ces hypothèses fertiles. Le flot de mes pensées vire gré des implications. Les écueils sauront s’occuper des sophismes jetés par dessus bord, et chaque biais mis à jour se verra mourir au soleil. Au dessus de moi, c’est un feu d’artifice qui jaillit à chaque inférence.

item.title: Paradigm change
item.description: Disclaimer:  This “rant” is not about whether one diet is better than another on any aspect, it’s about how we treat these different diets. Does not mean I’m not biased toward one or the other, and hopefully it won’t be too problematic to you. Problem setup  When you go to the restaurant, you need to check that your food is gluten free, lactose free, meat free, cruelty free, fish free, nut free or even other qualifiers.

item.title: Celcius
item.description: Intro First of all there is one difficult word in there : hearth which designates the floor of the fireplace. To appreciate this poem, I recommend you to look in the vague (outdoors if possible) and do not fix anything at all, just blurry vision, for like 30 seconds. No, not right now, at the end of the intro. Take a deep breath. Now look away and then don’t be distracted by anything.

item.title: Raymarching
item.description: Introduction I always had a keen interest into fractals, I played quite a fair bit with Apophysis. That’s how I created these images: As you can see, there was also transparency. They look very different on a white or on a black background, you can try (for the first two ones) Fractals give me a sentiment of infinite complexity, and complexity looks mesmerizing to me. Especially structured complexity, like see how in the Grand-Julian there is usage of symmetry, and also patterns like these circles waving around the red part?

item.title: My Tiny Dragon
item.description: Text I have a dragon in my room. One may ask “Show me your dragon” but I cannot. Sadly, it is small, very very small. And it is fast, very very fast. One may ask “Then how do you know it exists ?” Well it’s simple. Sometimes I feel like I tripped over something but no cable, no furniture just a perfectly flat floor, as if it just carelessly bumped into me.

item.title: Un essai maladroit de se faire comprendre.
item.description: Bonjour, Merci d’être venue ici. Je voulais donc répondre à ton message : Je vais être cru et peut être méchante mais des fois c’est chiant de parler avec toi. C’est peut être une rayure mais des fois j’ai l’impression que tu cherches la petite bête, que ce qui t’intéresse c’est le débat et pas vraiment l’avis de l’autre; ça me demande de réfléchir, de me concentrer, de chercher mes mots, et certaines fois je ne suis pas prête à ça.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m building a site, and I always encounter the weirdest bugs. Don’t ask me.
